metadata.title: Thursday, 2nd July, 2015
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    why funding to the Rural Roads Unit for the year 2015 has delayed; and
(b)    when the funds will be released.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    what radius the communication towers erected at the following places in Kabompo District will cover:
(i)    Chief Kalunga’s Palace at Chikenge; (ii)    Chief Chiyengele’s Palace at Kayombo; and (iii)    Dikolonga;
(b)    whether the Government has any plans to facilitate the extension of the radius; and
(c)    if so, when extension works will commence.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    how much money, in grants, on average, is given to the following secondary schools in Mpongwe District annually:
(i)    Ibenga Girls; (ii)    Mpongwe; and (iii)    Mpongwe South; and
(b)    why the boarding fees are high in relation to the income levels of the local communities; and
(c)    what deliberate measures have been taken to ensure that pupils from surrounding communities access the schools.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs what measures the Government is taking to remove private motor vehicles which are permanently parked at police stations country-wide.
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    whether the Government is satisfied with the quality of road works on the Great East Road from Arcades Shopping Mall to the Airport Roundabout;
(b)    when rehabilitation works will be completed; and
(c)    what measures the Government is taking to ensure that there is continued fast flow of traffic at the entrance and exit points of East Park Shopping Mall.
